getApplicantIndex(address).return: Returns valid index only if the user is already registered, 0 otherwise

getApplicantInfo(uint256).details: Retrieves the complete info about a perticular applicant.
getApplicantInfo(uint256).return: enrolled True if the applicant is already registered.name Applicants name.degreehash IPFS hash of the degree certificate.experiencehash IPFS hash of the Employment certificate.status Current status of Verificationapplicant_address Address of the applicant

getMyIndex().return: Returns valid index only if the user is already registered, 0 otherwise

newApplicant(string,string,string).details: Adds a new applicant if not already registered.

params._degreehash: IPFS hash of the degree certificate.
params._experiencehash: IPFS hash of the Employment certificate.

startContract().details: Disables circuit breaker enabling all functionality

stopContract().details: Enables circuit breaker stopping all functionality

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

employerVerification(uint256,uint256).notice: Function for the Employer to modify the Employer Verification for its outgoing employes.

getApplicantIndex(address).notice: To get the index of the user based on his address. Needed to retireve the Applicant information.

getApplicantTotal().notice: Returns the total number of applicants added using this contract

getMyIndex().notice: To know if the user is already registered

universityVerification(uint256,uint256).notice: Function for the university to modify the University Verification.
